name: Software Development Diploma
desc: A comprehensive program covering fundamentals of software development, including programming, database design, and web development.

name: Software Development Post-Diploma
desc: An advanced program for students with prior education in IT, focusing on specialized software development skills and industry applications.

name: Web Development Certificate
desc: A focused program on modern web development technologies, frameworks, and best practices.

name: Data Science Certificate
desc: An introductory program on data analysis, statistics, and machine learning using Python and R.

name: Cybersecurity Diploma
desc: Comprehensive training on network security, ethical hacking, and information security management.
